title: When You Fight A Yasuo With Allied Minions
body:
He'd be dashing around you all day.
https://camo.derpicdn.net/0818d66c88a808724e7166f3127a511d53272a04?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.yourepeat.com%2Fmedia%2Fgif%2F000%2F726%2F451%2Faadc7866d1fae0138638c8e54d039316.gif

replies.body:
New poppy will put an end to his nonsense.
That windwall doesn't stop hammers, does it?!
I dont think so, as far as I know. Since it IS considered an enemy projectile then it probably will.

Well, it was less of an actual question and more of a reference to the Scout's domination line, "Those hard arteries don't stop bullets, do they?"
All the same though, Poppy's W will hopefully do a number on Yasuo's obnoxious movement in lane.
even so, the windwall sure as fuck doesn't stop poppy.

> [{quoted}](name=H4nyuu,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4Jupdgih,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-30T12:51:53.146+0000)
>
> **FUN, INTUITIVE... GAMEEEEEPLLLLLLLAAAAAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYY**

Don't think I can handle this game anymore.
{{champion:31}} I see you really want to be in melee range...

*being chased by yasuo with low hp*
"i might get away!"
*sees ally minion wave incoming*
"no i wont"
Don't run toward them and take a side route.

_Poppy intercepts that Yas and "Heroically" beats him against a wall with a god d*** hammer for you."_
"yes I will"
Well poppys W will only block one dash soooo... i think? pretty sure it blocks one dash. i'll check again tho
Ult that Yas back to the stone age. Just for fun.

I don't think Yas dashes to the target tho lol. Pretty sure he goes untargetable before he appears above them. I don't recall being able to attack him while his ulting but I might be wrong. Pretty sure her W won't work on his ult tho.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
